channel.title: [24/7] _-++Province of Bloodshed++-_ [Factions & Anarchy][No Whitelist]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BeUuBfs.jpg[/img][/CENTER] [CENTER][size=24pt][u][b]205.237.129.6[/b][/u][/size][/CENTER]
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://serbcraft.servehttp.com/pob/forum.php"][b][u][size=18pt]Forums are located here[/size][/u][/b][/URL][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Mostly, anything goes on this server. Griefing becomes part of the game! (that doesn't mean that getting griefed is unnavoidable) Each player is allowed one small region to themselves that cannot be touched by any other player but them. Everything else is fair game though! Build defensively, trust nobody, and watch your back! Welcome to the jungle, b!tches![/CENTER]
[u]Side Note:[/u] Although I advertise that anything goes. [u]HACKING IS NOT OKAY![/u]
[u]One small note:[/u] When you first join wait about 30 seconds to play. The server is currently on a dedicated box in kansas. 4 cores 3.1 ghz per core and 36 gb of RAM. Bandwidth is 50 mbps down and 10 mbps up, I plan to get a better bandwidth connection in the future (which is why donations will help the server!)
[CENTER][u][b][size=18pt]Spawn information[/size][/b][/u][/CENTER] [CENTER]The spawn is a PvP free zone which is located, for the most part, away from everything else in the map. Most of the map is built around or in the jungle, which you may learn more about in the spoiler below this one.
You may not build in the spawn either, you also rapidly regenerate health in the spawn.
[CENTER][b]Here's some pictures of the spawn [/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/126WP7L.png[/img]
[u]You are greeted with the opportunity to teleport to the jungle where hidden treasure awaits![/u]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QcS0tVs.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][b][u][size=18pt]Welcome to the Jungle![/size][/u][/b][/CENTER] [CENTER]The Jungle actually happened by accident. I had to recreate a large portion of the map and I made it a giant jungle. I then hid chests in the jungle that automatically restock themselves. You may build and PvP in the jungle. The only parts of the jungle that you may not build in are the very small 4x4 areas where the chests are located or the Jungle Spawn location. You may also not PvP in the spawn location. There are currently around 30 chests all with different, and good quality, items in them.
[u]Here are some pictures of the artificially made jungle. [/u] (bare in mind that this jungle was made completely by hand)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xTUW32n.png[/img]
[u]Here's a picture of just one of the chests.[/u]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RUfu2Ni.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][b][u][size=18pt]Topographical View of the Map 01/31/13[/size][/u][/b][/CENTER] [CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C0DcKad.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][u][b][size=18pt]Factions Configuration READ!!! IMPORTANT!!![/size][/b][/u][/CENTER][/CENTER]
[ul][li]Enemy Factions may loot your land's chests when online or offline[/li] [li]Enemy Faction may grief your land only while online.[/li] [li]Ally faction may build and use chests on your land when online or offline[/li][/ul]
[CENTER][size=8pt]This type of configuration continues to promote the Anarchy aspect of the server while still incorporating the factions that have been requested.[/size]
[b][u][size=18pt]Donate to keep the server alive (and possibly work toward a new box!) and you'll receive a Donator rank![/size][/u][/b][/CENTER]
[size=8pt]After donating, you can email me at [email]serberus7.chase@live.com[/email], PM me on the minecraft forums, or contact me in-game. I will confirm your donation and you will be given your donator rank. If you PM me be sure to include the following: Amount Donated, Rank Desired, Username, and paypal used to donate with.[/size] [b][u]The Donator rank (5 USD) recieves:[/u][/b] - World edit commands: - - Fix Lava - - Green - - Fix Water - - Ascend - - Descend - Time Set Command - Weather Command - One Personal Protected Region regardless of factions (always protected and can even have PvP disabled if you like, the options are endless for your region and it's up to you) - Access to lockette protected chests
[b][u]Premium Donator rank (7 USD) recieves:[/u][/b] - All of the above - Full access to all worldedit commands - Access to create unlimited protected regions - Access to modify XP - One protected chest which restocks all diamond weapons/armor
[b][u]I sincerely thank all the current donators for helping keep the server alive.[/u][/b] [u]Current Donators:[/u] Iyiyiy9 (Premium Donator) Tchainzz (Basic Donator)
[size=8pt]Any abuse of commands will result in your rank being stripped from you. This is an anarchy server, which means griefing is allowed, although NOT through the use of donator commands.[/size] [CENTER][URL=http://"https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=5E5YFZ97CKE4Y"][IMG]https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif[/img][/URL][/CENTER][/CENTER]
[u]Plugins:[/u] PermissionsEx WorldEdit WorldGuard Essentianls Lockette ChestRestock Sortal AntiCheat Factions
[u]Staff:[/u] Serberus7 (owner) Jackoroma3 (Moderator) SirTak (Admin)
[ul][li]Creepers: Enabled[/li] [li]Lava Flow: Enabled[/li] [li]Fire Spread: Enabled[/li] [li]Water Flow: Enabled[/li] [li]TnT: Enabled[/li] [li]Chaos: Guaranteed.[/li][/ul]
[u]RULES:[/u]
[ul][li]Don't spam the chat[/li] [li]No hacking[/li] [li]Follow the rules[/li] [li]Do not consider the rules as suggestions[/li] [li]Don't disregard the rules[/li] [li]Read the rules[/li][/ul]

item.title: [24/7] _-++Province of Bloodshed++-_ [Factions & Anarchy][No Whitelist]
item.dc:creator: @Serberus7 Serberus7
item.description:
@Serberus7 wrote:

[CENTER]

BeUuBfs.jpg900×150
[/CENTER]
[CENTER][size=24pt]205.237.129.6[/size][/CENTER]

[CENTER][size=18pt]Forums are located here[/size][/CENTER]

[CENTER]Mostly, anything goes on this server. Griefing becomes part of the game! (that doesn’t mean that getting griefed is unnavoidable) Each player is allowed one small region to themselves that cannot be touched by any other player but them. Everything else is fair game though! Build defensively, trust nobody, and watch your back! Welcome to the jungle, b!tches![/CENTER]

Side Note: Although I advertise that anything goes. HACKING IS NOT OKAY!

One small note: When you first join wait about 30 seconds to play. The server is currently on a dedicated box in kansas. 4 cores 3.1 ghz per core and 36 gb of RAM. Bandwidth is 50 mbps down and 10 mbps up, I plan to get a better bandwidth connection in the future (which is why donations will help the server!)

[CENTER][size=18pt]Spawn information[/size][/CENTER]
[CENTER]The spawn is a PvP free zone which is located, for the most part, away from everything else in the map.
Most of the map is built around or in the jungle, which you may learn more about in the spoiler below this one.

You may not build in the spawn either, you also rapidly regenerate health in the spawn.

[CENTER]Here’s some pictures of the spawn

126WP7L.png1236×586

You are greeted with the opportunity to teleport to the jungle where hidden treasure awaits!

QcS0tVs.png1148×689
[/CENTER]

[CENTER][size=18pt]Welcome to the Jungle![/size][/CENTER]
[CENTER]The Jungle actually happened by accident.
I had to recreate a large portion of the map and I made it a giant jungle. I then hid chests in the jungle that automatically restock themselves. You may build and PvP in the jungle. The only parts of the jungle that you may not build in are the very small 4x4 areas where the chests are located or the Jungle Spawn location. You may also not PvP in the spawn location.
There are currently around 30 chests all with different, and good quality, items in them.

Here are some pictures of the artificially made jungle.
(bare in mind that this jungle was made completely by hand)

xTUW32n.png1261×668

Here’s a picture of just one of the chests.

RUfu2Ni.png1044×646

[/CENTER]

[CENTER][size=18pt]Topographical View of the Map 01/31/13[/size][/CENTER]
[CENTER]

C0DcKad.png715×740
[/CENTER]

[CENTER][size=18pt]Factions Configuration READ!!! IMPORTANT!!![/size][/CENTER][/CENTER]

[ul][li]Enemy Factions may loot your land’s chests when online or offline[/li]
[li]Enemy Faction may grief your land only while online.[/li]
[li]Ally faction may build and use chests on your land when online or offline[/li][/ul]

[CENTER][size=8pt]This type of configuration continues to promote the Anarchy aspect of the server while still incorporating the factions that have been requested.[/size]

[size=18pt]Donate to keep the server alive (and possibly work toward a new box!) and you’ll receive a Donator rank![/size][/CENTER]

[size=8pt]After donating, you can email me at serberus7.chase@live.com, PM me on the minecraft forums, or contact me in-game. I will confirm your donation and you will be given your donator rank. If you PM me be sure to include the following: Amount Donated, Rank Desired, Username, and paypal used to donate with.[/size]
The Donator rank (5 USD) recieves:

  • World edit commands:
      • Fix Lava
      • Green
      • Fix Water
      • Ascend
      • Descend
  • Time Set Command
  • Weather Command
  • One Personal Protected Region regardless of factions (always protected and can even have PvP disabled if you like, the options are endless for your region and it’s up to you)
  • Access to lockette protected chests

Premium Donator rank (7 USD) recieves:

  • All of the above
  • Full access to all worldedit commands
  • Access to create unlimited protected regions
  • Access to modify XP
  • One protected chest which restocks all diamond weapons/armor

I sincerely thank all the current donators for helping keep the server alive.
Current Donators:
Iyiyiy9 (Premium Donator)
Tchainzz (Basic Donator)

[size=8pt]Any abuse of commands will result in your rank being stripped from you.
This is an anarchy server, which means griefing is allowed, although NOT through the use of donator commands.[/size]
[CENTER][/CENTER][/CENTER]

Plugins:
PermissionsEx
WorldEdit
WorldGuard
Essentianls
Lockette
ChestRestock
Sortal
AntiCheat
Factions

Staff:
Serberus7 (owner)
Jackoroma3 (Moderator)
SirTak (Admin)

[ul][li]Creepers: Enabled[/li]
[li]Lava Flow: Enabled[/li]
[li]Fire Spread: Enabled[/li]
[li]Water Flow: Enabled[/li]
[li]TnT: Enabled[/li]
[li]Chaos: Guaranteed.[/li][/ul]

RULES:

[ul][li]Don’t spam the chat[/li]
[li]No hacking[/li]
[li]Follow the rules[/li]
[li]Do not consider the rules as suggestions[/li]
[li]Don’t disregard the rules[/li]
[li]Read the rules[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
